t like to left Rodimus behind but his common sense tell him that

Even as the =
trio of Cybertronians enter the room, it shudders slightly as subteranian t=
remors take hold. Sulpher and noxious gases burst from bubles within the ma=
gma that pools in this room. 

However the shuddering also reveals several =
exits from this place that were previously hidden. One large one that leads=
 on a rather direct route to the surface, but this one is largely filled wi=
th Magma as it is low to the gound. However another, which is still partial=
ly covered by debris leads off in a different direction. 

Despite the dest=
ruction of this chamber, this second tunnel appears to be more recently exc=
avated, and the debris nearly covering its entrance=A0is shielding it from =
the flow of Magma, keeping it largely clear. This tunnel leads in the same =
direction that Megatron had discerned the Decepticon and Predicon energy si=
gnatures going. =A0

The room shudders again. 

Preston
